scripts.serve: Starts a simple HTTP server on http://localhost:8081/ for running the Radlkarte locally.
scripts.geojson: Prepare the geoJSON data files for deployment (compressing etc.)
scripts.pois: Update all POIs from OpenStreetMap.org. This can take a while, better use a region-specific command.
scripts.pois:noe-suedost: Update all POIs for the NÖ-Südost region.
scripts.pois:rheintal: Update all POIs for the Rheintal region.
scripts.pois:schwarzatal: Update all POIs for the NÖ-Südost region.
